about.title: About Us
about.heroSubtitle: Bridging the gap between science and spiritual awakening through research and education.
about.intro1: Brahmarishi Vishwamitra Research Center is a non-profit initiative inspired by the ideals of Akhil Vishwa Gayatri Pariwar.
about.intro2: Our mission is to blend spiritual understanding, scientific inquiry, and social service to build a more enlightened and compassionate world.
about.intro3: We are committed to fostering human development through research, education, and community awareness.
about.mission1: To conduct research-based studies addressing key human challenges — education, health, civic sense, income equality, and environment.
about.mission2: To bridge ancient Vedic knowledge with modern science for practical and sustainable social solutions.
about.mission3: To promote awareness through education, public talks, and digital platforms.
about.mission4: To inspire youth to contribute as researchers, speakers, and change-makers in building a better world.
about.mission5: To nurture ethical, emotional, and intellectual growth aligned with the Gayatri and Yug Nirman philosophy.
about.visionText: To create a compassionate, educated, and sustainable society by integrating scientific research with spiritual wisdom, where education nurtures character, science serves humanity, and every individual contributes to the collective upliftment of nature and mankind.
about.visionAdditional: We envision a future where the wisdom of ancient traditions seamlessly blends with modern scientific understanding, fostering holistic development that serves both humanity and the planet we call home.
about.affiliation1: The Center works in spiritual alignment with the principles of Gayatri Pariwar, inspired by the divine vision of Pandit Shriram Sharma Acharya Ji — the founder of the Yug Nirman Mission and Shantikunj, Haridwar.
about.affiliation2: All World Gayatri Pariwar (AWGP) is a global spiritual and social organization dedicated to promoting human values, self-transformation, and scientific spirituality. It combines ancient wisdom with modern understanding to empower individuals and communities.
about.workText: BVSS organizes research discussions, awareness campaigns, and digital content to address social and environmental challenges. Our YouTube initiatives and educational programs spread research-backed insights on topics like education reform, mental health, civic values, and environmental balance.
about.workSubtext: We combine scientific research, spiritual practices, and community engagement to create meaningful and lasting impact. Our methods are rooted in tradition but guided by modern insights.
about.value1Desc: Guided by honesty and transparency in all initiatives.
about.value3Desc: Promoting harmony with nature and responsible living.
about.value4Desc: Merging research and consciousness for holistic development.
about.value5Desc: Empowering individuals to uplift society together.
about.ctaText: We invite thinkers, researchers, educators, and youth volunteers to join our movement for knowledge, service, and social transformation. Together, let us build a society rooted in wisdom, compassion, and self-evolution.
about.ctaSubtext: Explore our research, attend workshops, and engage with our community to awaken your potential.
